properties.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 1 at 10:33PM AKST until January 2 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches.

* WHERE...The northeast and eastern gulf coast including Sitka,
Yakutat, Elfin Cove, Pelican, and Port Alexander.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulations from snow showers may vary
significantly over short distances. As of 9 PM, Sitka observers
reported around 2 inches of snowfall for the storm.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY
